articles.author: Sue Lannin
articles.title: Federal Reserve hikes official interest rates by 0.5 per cent, Dow Jones jumps 900 points - ABC News
articles.description: As expected, the US Federal Reserve has increased official interest rates by 0.5 per cent and flagged more 0.5 per cent rate rises. Fed chairman Jerome Powell says inflation is too high and that is hurting the American people.
articles.content:
The US central bank has increased official US interest rates by an expected 0.5 per cent to curb the biggest price rises seen in 40 years.
